text: Alekun ninu aigbagbo ni didajo si awon osu owo (lati owo awon osebo). Won n fi ko isina ba awon tâ€™o sai gbagbo (nipa pe) won n se osu owo kan ni osu eto (fun ogun jija) ninu odun kan, won si n bu owo fun osu (ti ki i se osu owo) ninu odun (miiran, won ko si nii jagun ninu re) nitori ki won le yo onka osu ti Allahu se ni owo sira won. Won si tipase bee se ni eto ohun ti Allahu se ni eewo. Won se ise aburu won ni oso fun won. Allahu ko nii fi ona mo ijo alaigbagbo
